overview: Mayhem, violence and lessons in life ensue when a drone drops its cargo after being shot by border patrol officers in a forgotten rural country. Three border patrol guards of a fictional forgotten society are still on duty somewhere on the edge of the world. They haven't seen a person at their little border patrol house for ages. But this particular day will be different. A high pitched motorized sound is coming from the sky in the distance. A drone carrying a cardboard box is getting closer to pass the border. Amazed as the guards are they shoot at the object. They hit it and the drone drops its cargo before fleeing in the other direction. With high caution the guards find the cargo and open up the box, unaware of the changes it will generate in their lives.
title: Køt
